about_the_game:
New Moons: A Free-to-Play AAA Sci-Fi Shooter – Wishlist Now for Closed Beta Access!

New Moons is a groundbreaking, free-to-play AAA-quality sci-fi shooter powered by Unreal Engine 5. Dive into the fast-paced Combat Arena, experience thrilling multiplayer modes like Battle Royale, Tactical 5v5, and MOBA, or shape the galaxy’s fate in a cinematic campaign.

Wishlist now to join the exclusive Closed Beta, unlock rare rewards like the Pioneer Badge, and be among the first to leave your mark on this epic universe.

Key Features

Fast-Paced Combat Arena

Step into the action with adrenaline-pumping battles in the Combat Arena. Fight to survive in dynamic, chaotic matches designed for intense, competitive play.

Thrilling Multiplayer Modes

  • Battle Royale & Mini-Royale: Compete for survival in expansive, high-stakes battles.

  • Tactical 5v5 Shooter: Engage in strategic, team-based combat with precise, skill-based gameplay.

  • MOBA Shooter: Command heroes in action-packed, objective-based battles.

Cinematic Campaign

Shape the fate of the galaxy in an immersive single-player experience filled with exploration, conflict, and tough choices that define the universe’s future.

Kid-Friendly Modes

Playful, colorful environments with a kid-focused design and robust parental controls.

Breathtaking Worlds

Explore handcrafted sci-fi landscapes with dynamic weather, hidden secrets, and stunning visuals.

Fully Customizable Arsenal

Adapt your playstyle by personalizing weapons, abilities, and gear—whether you prefer stealth, strategy, or all-out chaos.

Claim Rare Rewards for Wishlisting!

Wishlist now to unlock the Pioneer Badge, your exclusive mark as an early supporter. Secure Closed Beta access and earn the ultra-rare Challenger Badge by being among the first wave of combatants.

Don’t miss your chance to shape the galaxy’s future and leave your legacy in this universe!

Why Alpha Players Love New Moons

  • "Intense multiplayer action, cinematic storytelling, and breathtaking visuals—all in one game."

  • "A sci-fi shooter with something for everyone: from competitive battles to family-friendly fun."

  • "New Moons redefines free-to-play with AAA quality and unforgettable gameplay."

name: New Moons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400 or Intel® Core™ i5-6600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 470, NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or Intel® Arc™ A580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: New Moons is a free-to-play AAA-quality sci-fi shooter powered by Unreal Engine 5. Dominate in the fast-paced Combat Arena, dive into Battle Royale, Tactical 5v5, and MOBA modes, or shape the galaxy’s fate in a cinematic campaign. Wishlist now for Closed Beta access and exclusive rewards!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek, Hungarian*, Indonesian, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
